languages.text: {n}Невидимая, но ясно ощутимая аура силы окутывает фигуру в робе техножреца. Тем удивительнее, что голос, раздающийся из-под капюшона, так по-юношески восторжен.{/n} "Вот оно. Место, откуда мы происходим".

{n}An invisible yet clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure clad in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is all the more baffling to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "This is it. The place of our origin."
languages.original_text: {n}Невидимая, но ясно ощутимая аура силы окутывает фигуру в робе техножреца. Тем удивительнее, что голос, раздающийся из-под капюшона, так по-юношески восторжен.{/n} "Вот оно. Место, откуда мы происходим".

traits.locale_text: {n}Invisible, but clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is rather surprising to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "Here it is. The place of our origin."

{n}Invisible, but clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is rather surprising to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "Here it is. The place of our origin."

{n}An invisible yet clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure clad in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is all the more baffling to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "Here it is. The place of our origin."

{n}An invisible yet clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure clad in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is all the more baffling to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "This is it. The place of our origin."

{n}An invisible yet clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure clad in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is all the more baffling to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "This is it. The place of our origin."

languages.text: {n}Une aura de pouvoir à la fois invisible et tangible enveloppe l'être vêtu d'une robe de technoprêtre. Il est d'autant plus troublant d'entendre une jeune voix excitée provenir de sous sa capuche.{/n} « Nous y sommes. Le lieu de nos origines. »
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible yet clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure clad in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is all the more baffling to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "This is it. The place of our origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une aura de pouvoir à la fois invisible et tangible enveloppe l'être vêtu d'une robe de technoprêtre. Il est d'autant plus troublant d'entendre une jeune voix excitée provenir de sous sa capuche.{/n} « Nous y sommes. Le lieu de nos origines. »

languages.text: {n}Un aura de poder invisible, pero claramente tangible, envuelve a la figura que porta la túnica de un tecnosacerdote. Lo que resulta aún más desconcertante es que de su capucha emane una voz juvenil y emocionada.{/n} «Aquí es. De aquí provenimos».
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible yet clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure clad in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is all the more baffling to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "This is it. The place of our origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un aura de poder invisible, pero claramente tangible, envuelve a la figura que porta la túnica de un tecnosacerdote. Lo que resulta aún más desconcertante es que de su capucha emane una voz juvenil y emocionada.{/n} «Aquí es. De aquí provenimos».

languages.text: {n}这个身影穿着技术神甫的长袍，浑身上下散发着看不见但却能触碰到的力量。更令你困惑的是，长袍下面传来了兴奋不已的年轻声音。{/n}“就是这里，这里就是我们诞生的地方。”
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible yet clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure clad in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is all the more baffling to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "This is it. The place of our origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个身影穿着技术祭司的长袍，浑身上下散发着看不见但却能触碰到的力量。更令你困惑的是，长袍下面传来了兴奋不已的年轻声音。{/n}“就是这里，这里就是我们诞生的地方。”

languages.text: {n}Eine unsichtbare, aber doch greifbare Aura der Macht umgibt die Gestalt in den Roben eines Techpriesters. Das macht es umso verblüffender, eine jugendlich aufgeregte Stimme von unter der Kapuze zu hören.{/n} "Das ist er. Das ist der Ort unserer Herkunft."
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible yet clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure clad in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is all the more baffling to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "This is it. The place of our origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine unsichtbare, aber doch greifbare Aura der Macht umgibt die Gestalt in den Roben eines Techpriesters. Das macht es umso verblüffender, eine jugendlich aufgeregte Stimme von unter der Kapuze zu hören.{/n} "Das ist er. Das ist der Ort unserer Herkunft."

languages.text: {n}技術司祭のローブをまとった人物を、目に見えないのになぜかはっきりと目に見える力のオーラが包み込んでいる。そのフードの下から聞こえてきた声は若々しく興奮した声ものであり、それがあなたをさらに困惑させる。{/n}「ここだ。我々の起源となる場所だ」
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible yet clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure clad in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is all the more baffling to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "This is it. The place of our origin."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭のローブをまとった人物を、目に見えないのになぜかはっきりと目に見える力のオーラが包み込んでいる。そのフードの下から聞こえてきた声は若々しく興奮した声ものであり、それがあなたをさらに困惑させる。{/n}「ここだ。我々の起源となる場所だ」

languages.text: {n}Görünmez ama net bir şekilde hissedilen bir güç aurası, Tekno Rahip cübbesi içindeki figürü sarmalıyor. Kapüşonun altından genç ve heyecanlı bir ses duyduğunda işler daha şaşırtıcı bir hâle bürünüyor.{/n} "İşte burası. Senin kökenin burada."
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible yet clearly tangible aura of power envelops the figure clad in the robes of a Tech-Priest. It is all the more baffling to hear a youthfully excited voice from under the hood.{/n} "This is it. The place of our origin."
